name: Totally legit plant vs zombie game
name_original: Totally legit plant vs zombie game
description:
jk! this is just a badly written pvz ripoff from a coding newbie. The code quality is probably even worse (a lot worse) than tf2s but I really worked hard on it and I'm quite proud haha. 

Music is composed by Laura Shigihara and belongs to PopCap. 

(please don't sue me PopCap ;-;)
